snippet.title: Eastward - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/977880/Eastward
Pre-order on Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/eastward-switch/

Read the latest Dev Blog here: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/977880

Eastward is a beautifully detailed and charming adventure game, from Shanghai-based indie developers, Pixpil, coming to PC, Mac & Nintendo Switch September 16, 2021!

In the near-future, society is starting to collapse, and the human population is at an all-time low. A deadly toxic presence has spread across the land, destroying and devouring everything in its path.

Escape a subterranean society and join Eastward’s unlikely duo on an exciting adventure to the land above! Discover beautiful yet bizarre settlements and make new friends as you travel across the world by rail.

Join the Chucklefish Discord: https://discord.gg/ReKC8df
Pixpil on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pixpilgames
Chucklefish on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChucklefishLTD
Eastward on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/eastward/
Official website: https://eastwardgame.com/
